title: Selektor Slab
content:
Selektor Slab is small font family created as logical extending of the Selektor font family.

More: [http://www.tourdefonts.com/font-catalog/selektor-slab/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414030102/http:/www.tourdefonts.com/font-catalog/selektor-slab/)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414030102im_/http:/typophile.com/files/0SelektorSlab_Poster1_4888.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414030102im_/http:/typophile.com/files/0SelektorSlab_Poster2_3419.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414030102im_/http:/typophile.com/files/0SelektorSlab_Poster3_4597.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414030102im_/http:/typophile.com/files/0SelektorSlab_Poster4_5826.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414030102im_/http:/typophile.com/files/0SelektorSlab_Poster5_5992.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414030102im_/http:/typophile.com/files/0SelektorSlab_Poster6_5634.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414030102im_/http:/typophile.com/files/0SelektorSlab_Poster7_4351.png)

[Fonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414030102/http:/www.fonts.com/findfonts/searchresults.htm?foundry=Tour+de+Force+Font+Foundry)

author: tourdeforce
